title: What Doesn't Kill You: A Kowalski Thriller
description: Someone is killing Russians across Poland. France is breaking out in riots. The bodycount in Arizona is on the rise.The 21st century draws near and the world is about to change. No more so than for Piotr Kowalski. Piotr is a member of GROM, Polandâ€™s Navy SEALs, and what starts off as a mission in Poland leads him to other exotic locations. From the grime of France to the dusty heat of Arizona and everywhere in between, Piotr will learn if he has what few in the world do. Or die trying.
author: Tony Hernandez
